page.title: 08A Typical Saturday For Jane
page.content: When I woke up at 9.00am my mum had already gone to work. I got up, listened to the radio and got dressed and washed.Then I went to the shop for my dad with Nicola my sister.We got back at about 10.30am and watched the end of a television film called "Little Mo". We had lunch at 12.40pm.After that I played tennis outside.At 2.00pm. I went to a badminton club at Clifton Hospital.Badminton finished at 4.00pm and when I returned home I played on the computer.At 5.45pm. my dad went for my mum at work.We had our tea at 6.30pm and I played on the computer again.At 7.50pm. I watched television.After that I played "Connect 4" and "Guess Who" with Nicola and then I got a drink and went to bed.
